bibl.title: Studies on the History of Late Antique and Christian Nubia, edited by Tomas HÄGG, László TÖRÖK and Derek A. WELSBY. (Variorum. Collected Studies Series. CS748.)
bibl.note: Reproduction de 24 articles (1934-1994) et 1 inédit. - Pp. ix-xxi: Preface.
bibl.seg: KIRWAN Laurence P. (Sir), Studies on the History of Late Antique and Christian Nubia, edited by Tomas HÄGG, László TÖRÖK and Derek A. WELSBY. (Variorum. Collected Studies Series. CS748.)
Aldershot - Burlington, Vermont, Ashgate, 2002, 8°, xxii-25 articles et pp. 1-13 (Indices), 1 portrait, figg., cartes, pll. ISBN 0-86078-893-8. £57.50.
Reproduction de 24 articles (1934-1994) et 1 inédit. - Pp. ix-xxi: Preface.
C.R. par Malgorzata Martens-Czarnecka, BibO 60 (2003) coll. 635-637.
